captions.text: BUT THEY DID FIND THE AXE.
AND PEOPLE SAY YOU CAN STILL HEAR THE DEAD WOODSMAN'S HAUNTED
THAT'S THE LAMEST GHOST STORY EVER!
THAT STORY USED TO SCARE ME SILLY WHEN I WAS YOUR KIDS' AGE.
AN AXE MURDERING WOODSMAN IS THE KIND OF STUFF WE
>>SO THAT'S WHY I SAW ELMO STICKING OSCAR THE GROUCH
UM, HAVE I EVER TOLD YOU KIDS THE STORY OF MY OLD I-PHONE?
NOW, LONG BEFORE THE I-PHONE 6,057S THERE WAS THE IPHONE 5S.
IT WEIGHED NEARLY FOUR OUNCES AND WAS A CENTIMETER THICK.
NOW AS LONG AS YOU DON'T SHOW IT FEAR,
HOW COULD YOU LIFT SOMETHING THIS HEAVY?
WAS NO MORE THAN FOUR AND IN A PLACE LIKE THIS,
HECK, YOU'D BE LUCKY TO GET THREE.
>>DEPENDS, I REMEMBER THERE WAS THIS NIGHT,
IT TOOK ME A FULL MINUTE JUST TO DOWNLOAD A MOVIE.
NOTHING HAS EVER TAKEN THAT LONG TO DOWNLOAD.
GRANDPA'S JUST TRYING TO SCARE US.
I REMEMBER THERE WAS A TIME BEFORE WE EVEN INSTANTLY
>NO, I KNOW WHAT HE'S TALKING ABOUT.
WE LEARNED ABOUT IT IN MY ANCIENT HISTORY CLASS.
IT WAS THIS WEIRD LOOKING VIDEO VENDING MACHINE
>>THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS A "RED BOX."
THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS A "RED BOX."
"RED BOX"AIN'T NOTHING TO BE SCARED OF.
NOW, BLOCKBUSTER VIDEO ON THE OTHER HAND...
HAVE I EVER TELL YOU KIDS THE STORY OF THE LATE FEE OF 2003?
>>I WANT TO CALL MY MOM, BUT MY PHONE BLEW AWAY!
>>I REMEMBER IT LIKE IT WAS YESTERDAY.
THE MOVIE PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN HAD JUST
BACK WHEN JOHNNY DEPP STILL CARED ABOUT HIS CAREER.
>>GUESS HOW I GOT TO  BLOCKBUSTER THAT DAY.
>>[SCREAMS] AND IT TOOK ME FIVE WHOLE
>>HOW WERE YOU STILL INTERESTED IN SOMETHING AFTER FIVE
WHEN I GOT TO THE VIDEO STORE AN AWKWARD TEENAGED VIDEO
AND HE SPOKE WORDS TO ME WITH HIS OWN MOUTH!
AND DO YOU KNOW WHAT HE SAID WHEN I ASKED ABOUT THE VIDEO?
>>HE SAID, "SORRY SIR, WE'RE ALL CHECKED OUT!"
LIKE YOU HAD TO WAIT 20 SECONDS AND THEN--
I HAVEN'T EVEN TOLD YOU WHAT A VHS IS!
